The material receives positive feedback for being durable, thick, and stretchy, while effectively shaping the body. Regarding size, while some customers find it perfect, others note it runs small. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect dress but non forgiving for body imperfections
items.body: Beautiful dress. The material has a medium thickness, not thin, but not thick. It is stretchy. Definitely not see through. Comes mid thigh. Fit is tight, in a good way. It hugs every curve. However, this dress will expose every imperfection of your body, extra rolls, dimples, indentations, or bellys. If needed, a good shape wear may be a requirement for this dress. I recommend the dress, but just understand, youâ€™re buying a dress that is not forgiving for body imperfection. It will be perfect for some and a disaster for others! Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classy, Cute and Form Fitting
items.body: I bought a medium size in the color black. I opened it and thought I bought a different size. I tried it on and I love it! I love the way it Is form fitting, comfortable. The fabric is perfect and breathable. It is a classy, clean looking and it can be dressed up in any way. If I put on a necklace, youâ€™d think I purchased it at a high end store! The price is very reasonable. It shows off my curves in a nice and sleek way. I am 5 feet, 7 inches tall. I weigh 145. I am ordering more colors because I love this dress so much. Read more
items.author: Boston

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sporty Tight Fit Dress
items.body: Size up! Material is thick and great quality. I bought two dresses, one med and one large. The large fit me best. The medium was super snug and restrictive. Iâ€™m 5â€™10 160lbs. Not sheer at all. I wore with my body shaper underneath to tuck in my gut lol and couldnâ€™t tell. Very tight fitting and complementary to my shape. Wore the oatmeal color dress with some sneakers and gold accessories. Turned out just how I needed it to look. Read more
items.author: MsShopalot

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not true to size but nice
items.body: I donâ€™t know if itâ€™s just me but if your a little bit on the slimmer side listen, everything looked sexy and fit good besides the chest and shoulders part. I wish I wouldâ€™ve taken a picture. Itâ€™s very loose at the top and I ordered my normal size. Iâ€™m 5â€™5 and 126 pounds. Itâ€™s short so I canâ€™t size down but if youâ€™re shorter you should be fine. Overall a lovely dress soft and thick Read more
items.author: Riyah

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Chic, Comfortable, and Instantly Confidence-Boosting!
items.body: I am thrilled with this OQQ mini dress! It's the perfect combination of sporty and sexy. I got the Black one, and it's an absolute wardrobe staple. The ribbed fabric is substantialâ€”it's thick enough to feel high-quality and smooths out all your curves perfectly. The tummy control feature is subtle but effective; it provides gentle compression that gives a beautiful, bodycon silhouette without being uncomfortable. What I love most is the polo collar and V-neck. It adds a sophisticated, preppy touch that elevates it beyond a basic dress. It's incredibly versatile: I've dressed it up with heels and worn it casually with sneakers. It keeps its shape all day, washes well, and the short sleeves are great for warmer weather. For the price, the quality and the flattering fit are unbeatable! Highly, highly recommend. Read more
items.author: Ivette Diaz-Morales

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I have BODY in this dress!
items.body: I love the thick fabric of this dress and it fits me perfect. I ordered a size XL. My body measurements are 46 in bust (I wear 38G in bras from Soma) I have a 35 inch waist and 45 in hips. I am 5 foot 4 inches tall and weigh 200.4lbs. Its form fitting and makes me look great. I've worn this dress to the golf course, to brunch, and to plenty of restaurants for dinner. It hugs my curves perfectly and the ribbing in the dress hides my small fupa. If you wear a waist trainer under it make sure the waist trainer is a seamless one with a zipper so that you don't see the folds of the waist trainer straps underneath. I purchased this dress in red, black and white. I love OQQ for the perfect fit and style that makes you look chic and curvy. Read more
items.author: Chasity Z. Anderson

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Okay fit just right
items.author: Vivian

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good dress!
items.body: Very comfortable and is very stretchy, Large size Read more
items.author: Riccardi

short_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve Bodycon is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Pea Green, Grey Blue, Black, Mocha, Tea Leaf, Blues, Oatmeal, Armygreen, Pitaya, Darkgreen, Red, Candypink, Fluorescent Pink a, Beige. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
